title: California unicorn tech firm expands to Tampa Bay - St Pete Catalyst
content: California unicorn tech firm expands to Tampa Bay  St Pete Catalyst
description: California tech startup Verkada has just opened its first office in Tampa Bay and is rapidly growing its local presence.Â  Verkada, a cloud-based security platform solution firm based in San Mateo, was founded in 2016 by three Stanford graduates. The tech startup, which provides security cameras to sensors, reached its unicorn status in 2020 due [...]
